statements: SELECT * FROM parent_feedback;
SELECT parent_name, school_program FROM parent_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT parent_name, rating FROM parent_feedback ORDER BY parent_name ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_feedback WHERE school_program LIKE '%arts%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM parent_feedback;
SELECT * FROM parent_feedback WHERE school_program = 'Math' AND rating > 3 ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_name, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM parent_feedback GROUP BY parent_name ORDER BY highest_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND comment LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT parent_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM parent_feedback GROUP BY parent_name HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY parent_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, school_program FROM parent_feedback GROUP BY school_program ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE policy_rating = 5;
SELECT parent_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE program_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE policy_rating > 3 AND program_rating < 4;
SELECT educator_name, years_of_experience FROM educators WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT educator_name, feedback_text FROM educators INNER JOIN feedback ON educators.feedback_id = feedback.id;
SELECT parent_name, feedback_text, policy_rating FROM feedback;
SELECT educator_name, years_of_experience FROM educators WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT feedback.id, feedback_text, educator_name FROM feedback JOIN educators ON feedback.id = educators.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE policy_rating IS NOT NULL AND program_rating > 3;
SELECT educator_name, years_of_experience, parent_name, feedback_text FROM educators JOIN feedback ON educators.feedback_id = feedback.id WHERE years_of_experience < 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM programs WHERE program_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 AND parent_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT policy_name, description, implementation_date FROM policies WHERE implementation_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT program_name, details FROM programs WHERE details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT policy_feedback, program_feedback FROM feedback WHERE parent_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT program_description FROM programs WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT educator_name, position FROM educators ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT educator_name, position FROM educators ORDER BY educator_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM programs WHERE program_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT f.parent_name, e.educator_name, p.policy_name FROM feedback f JOIN educators e ON f.feedback_id = e.feedback_id JOIN policies p ON e.feedback_id = p.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM ParentsFeedback;
SELECT parent_name, rating FROM ParentsFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ProgramsFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM SchoolPolicies WHERE policy_category = 'Safety';
SELECT educator_name, educator_role FROM Educators;
SELECT * FROM ParentsFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, feedback_text FROM ProgramsFeedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT educator_name, educator_role FROM Educators WHERE educator_role = 'Teacher' AND educator_id < 10 ORDER BY educator_name;
SELECT policy_type, policy_description, policy_category FROM SchoolPolicies WHERE policy_category = 'Safety' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT input_text, input_date FROM CommunityInput WHERE input_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY input_id;
